name: Ascender
description: Ascender is a 2D explorative puzzle platformer. The game is set in the open world of GOA's districts, and the player will face many unique puzzles to solve.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP 2+ Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Stereo Additional Notes: Better with joystick
